org.lindbergframework.web.core.configuration
Interface WebCoreConfiguration

All Superinterfaces:
Configuration, CoreConfiguration
All Known Implementing Classes:
WebClassPathXmlCoreConfiguration
public interface WebCoreConfiguration
extends CoreConfiguration

interface that defines the contract for core configuration implementation to work in the web context.

Author:
Victor Lindberg
